sentences.sentence: You are an inspiration to me, brother Paladin .
sentences.translation: 你是我的灵感之源，圣骑士兄弟。

sentences.sentence: Players may only have one Seal on them per Paladin at any one time.
sentences.translation: 每个玩家同时只能从每个圣骑士处得到一个圣印。
